The next Information & Records Management Society (IRMS) Conference 2017 will take place on 21-23 May, at the Hilton in Glasgow, Scotland. The conference focuses on records management and record-keeping for the commercial business sector rather than the heritage arena but is still relevant in certain areas.

For more information about the program, click here for a conference summary or the full program.

Conference Topics

  • the new European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
  • Office 365
  • Automation
  • the Future of Information & Records Management
  • Sharepoint
  • Change Management
  • Cyber Security
  • Sustainability

Key Features

  • High-level keynotes
  • Focused workshops
  • Interactive debates
  • Comprehensive exhibition
  • Peer-to-peer networking
  • Fully inclusive conference and hotel packages
